name: body language
description:
content warnings: verbal abuse, bullying, fatphobia, vague indications of a naked body.

this game contains quotes about my body from the bullies and abusers of my past. i made this in approximately six hours in rpg maker. i only used rpg maker assets; none of the tiles, sprites, or music are original. 

this includes the rtp. let me know if i should upload a smaller version for folx who already have vx ace.
